findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to stop or pause transactions.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens and can take advantage of it by calling the mint function, resulting in highly inflated contract tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner's ability to increase fees is limited to a reasonable percentage of 25%

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has restricted access to increasing the amount of liquidity taken by the dev wallet beyond a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens, which can lead to highly inflated contract tokens.

findings.title: CO - Code Optimization
findings.description: There are code segments that could be optimized to reduce size, memory consumption, and execution time.

findings.title: Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: Redundant Statements
findings.description: Detect the usage of redundant statements that have no effect.
